rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style entrance with stone arches and wooden carvings.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with traditional woodwork and natural lighting. Includes a window facing east for positive energy as per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room; includes a stone dining table with traditional Kerala motifs.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Well-planned kitchen area designed in line with Vastu principles with south-eastern placement for the stove to promote positive flow of energy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom featuring a spacious balcony on the north side (ideal for relaxation and morning light). Includes built-in storage following Kerala-style aesthetics.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom with its own balcony and traditional detailing ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom designed with Kerala-style tiles, placed in the west to maintain balance as per Vastu norms.

rooms.name: Utility Closet
rooms.description: Small closet for storage of cleaning supplies and maintenance tools.

openings.description: Traditional wooden door with carved detailing.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A spacious rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and a relaxing space. Equipped with traditional stone seating and water features in line with Kerala aesthetics.

openings.location: From ground floor to Rooftop Terrace

building_norms.compliance: Adheres to local building norms including minimum setbacks, fire safety standards and Vastu guidelines for directional placements. Roof terrace and balconies are designed in line with environmental sustainability practices.
